text:
Hi
I implemented HubSpot Ticket API . And i used HubSpot_owner_id for set the Ticket owner.
I need to set HubSpot_owner_id owner id instead of owner email. Is there any option for that?
Have you set the plain text on the email in the prod env?
how do we set the plain text
Both emails are set up in same way in both envirnoment
Only diff in test and prod, prod had an active domain while test does not have a domain
Thanks, I think I was missing the setting plain text version
now it’s working
JFYI, the developer docs are acting wonky. I can't get it to load consistently
What are you seeing when it’s failing to load?
"waiting for <http://knowledge.HubSpot.com|knowledge.HubSpot.com>" in the bottom left (browser loading area)
and eventually a white screen that says...(one sec, waiting for it)
ahhh so you’re seeing it with the knowledgebase and not the developer docs
Thanks for the heads up I’ll let that team know
I think both
one sec
dev docs just show that eventually (but not every time)

:thinking_face: Looking into it, thank you for flagging!

Edit: this issue should be resolved for all now.

Hi <@U02BKD6EM47>,

Would you please share some examples/references or API (you are using currently) for your requirements?
I am also experiencing this

After adding my app here, I wan't to show dropdown which contains list of name/ids before saving action.
How can I do that ?
Great :+1:

Is there a way to escape an email variable using HubL in a HubSpot email so when special characters are inserted, they are not lost in the browser address bar. Example: _`<http://www.domain.com/marketing-offer?firstname={{contact.firstname}}&lastname={{contact.lastname}}&email={{contact.email}}>`_
An example would be an email in this format `<mailto:name+1@domain.com|name+1@domain.com>`
The `+` becomes a space in the browser address bar. Would like to escape the variable.
This is in a HubSpot email.

hey guys!
is it possible to query all properties including custom? for example:
```I want to get all the properties without needing to enter the properties array```

Hello!

I was wondering if it’s possible to create a *pop-up book a meeting* calendar. As far as I know HubSpot lets you create pop up FORMS. But I am looking for a pop up book a meeting solution. I found a third party plugin called <https://startups.belch.io/>. But this is focused on forms. Not on meetings.

Example: after clicking the CTA ‘book a demo’ > it should give me a pop up with the calendar embedded in there.
We are using custom token  for sender email address, and our email keep on ending in junk mailbox
Is there any way we  make sure that email do not end in junk mailbox

We are using custom token  for sender email address, and our email keep on ending in junk mailbox

Is there any way we  make sure that email do not end in junk mailbox
recall what the app was?

So things that would get synced (our customers are the Shopify merchants):

merchant_total_number_orders
mercant_monthly_sales
merchant_install_date (date they installed our app)

things like that
We’re doing this ourselves via code but Id imagine other shopify developers that use HubSpot would want similar data

Try using the `|urlencode` hubl filter. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#urlencode|https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/filters#urlencode>

You _may_ need to be part of the Programmable email beta for that to work (don’t remember off hand if the render order of tokens and filters works as expected in emails without that beta)
HI , I am creating a HubSpot App and need help with how we can set multi-lingual content for app title. description

Is there a possibility to get the language-specific label of a HubSpot property via *API*?

There is a HubSpot defined dropdown field Branche (industry) in companies
- I want to show it in a CRM-Card and therefore need the label of the field.

With an API call GET /crm/v3/objects/companies/myCompany?properties=industry
I get the value of the property,
With an API call GET /properties/v1/companies/properties/named/industry
I get the *english* label of the property. (e.g. INDIVIDUAL_FAMILY_SERVICES)
How do I get the *german* label of the property? (e.g. Individuelle und familiäre Dienstleistungen)
(sample data of this property:
  LABEL                                                                 INTERNER WERT
  Import und Export                                             IMPORT_AND_EXPORT
  Individuelle und familiäre Dienstleistungen   INDIVIDUAL_FAMILY_SERVICES
  Industrielle Automatisierung                            INDUSTRIAL_AUTOMATION     ........)
